    • Method Detail

      • getAnnotatedElement

        AnnotatedElement getAnnotatedElement()
        Returns:
        The AnnotatedElement for the member seeking a bridge, offering access to its annotations.

      • getMemberName

        String getMemberName()
        Returns:
        the member name for log and exception report purposes.

      • isId

        boolean isId()
        Returns:
        true if the indexed type is the document id, false otherwise.

      • isExplicitlyMarkedAsNumeric

        boolean isExplicitlyMarkedAsNumeric()
        Returns:
        whether the field in question is marked as numeric field by means of the {code NumericField} annotation or not.

      • getElementOrContainerReturnType

        Class<?> getElementOrContainerReturnType()
        Returns the type of the indexed member/property; it works for arrays and collections too.
        Returns:
        the type of the indexed member
